eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric

Class ParallelMaximumLikelihood

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.ParallelMaximumLikelihood
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterLearningAlgorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MaximumLikelihoodFading

    public class ParallelMaximumLikelihood
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParameterLearningAlgorithm
    This class implements the ParameterLearningAlgorithm interface, and defines the parallel Maximum Likelihood algorithm.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#pmlexample
